name: Bill Gates' Firey Gauntlet
description:
Directly from the instructions.txt:

In Bill Gates' Firey gauntlet, you play as a MS Paint creation desperately fighting for survival against Bill Gates' attempts to remove Paint from the computer.

CONTROLS:
W, A, S, and D to move your character, space to jump/shoot. There is also a level that uses mouse controls.

Press R at any time to restart the current level, There are a few rare but gamebreaking bugs that I was too lazy to fix, so all you have to do is press R and hope it doesn't happen again.

Enjoy!
